title: Indiana Jones Bonus Disc - Bonus Disc
description:
Indiana Jones - Bonus Disc [Indiana Jones: Making the Trilogy (2003)]

Behind the curtain scenes. A background on all the three classical Indiana Jones Movies, namely:

1. Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)

2. Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989) - and
 	
3. Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)

How the movie was shot. How the difficult scenes were made. What difficulties did the film makers face. This DVD tells you all. In addition, you see a number of things, that you do not see in the above movies.

Download this extraordinary film and see all the uncut scenes from the above movies.

A must for all Indiana Jones fans


Audio - English

Subtitles - English, Deutsch, Cesky, Nederlands, Magyar, Polski, Turkce [In the title above, you find only two, because more options were not available for me to fill. In actual there are subtitles in 7 languages as mentioned here. Noted directly from the DVDs main menu, and written as they appear there]

Enjoy
